name: Extra Potatoes Please
description:
Hey friend! The plague has already reached our farm! We need to find a way to the other side! Try to save as many potato friends as you can. And be careful keep your distance with the plague OR YOU WILL TUUURN! Take care of your potato family before it's too late...

WE NEED TO SAVE OUR SPECIES! 

Controls:
WASD to move

SHIFT to sprint

SPACE to jump

E to aggro your friends

Q to unaggro your friends to wait

Challenges 

- Extra Historian - - Extra Distance - ! Extra Retro !
